text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes ‘Many months’???? 
You were in India on 24/25 February on a friendly visit. BTW all the places you visited are hit the hardest with Covid19 because of the crowds your ‘friend’ Modi gathered...... sleep with that now!!
